mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT id AS couponsId, shopId, cpName as couponsName, date_format(startTime,'%Y/%m/%d') as startTime, date_format(endTime,'%Y/%m/%d') as endTime, useLimit, amount FROM nb_coupons WHERE shopId = #{shopId} and status=2 and couponsType=2 and now() BETWEEN startTime AND endTime

SELECT count(*) FROM nb_coupons_users WHERE userId = #{userId} AND couponId = #{couponId}
